text: Miao (廟) are buildings in East Asian religions where people worship gods and legendary heroes. They are a kind of Chinese temple and are different than Ci Shrines where people are worshipped instead of gods. The word shenmiao (神庙, lit God-Miao) is normally translated as temple == Related pages == * Mausoleum * Shinto shrine * Mitamaya (uses the same character) == References == Category:Temples Category:Taoism Category:Buildings and structures in Vietnam Category:Pages with unreviewed translations Category:Death customs Category:Religious buildings and structures in Asia
title: Miao shrine
